alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lafayette, eastern Yalobusha, Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Water Valley to 6 miles east of Coffeeville to 6 miles north of Grenada. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Slate Springs, Sabougla, Randolph, Springdale, Banner, Velma, Paris, Big Creek, Robbs, Reid, Loyd, Ellard, Tyson and Gums. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
